snippet.title: Broken Sun MMORPG – Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Welcome to the world of Broken Sun - MMORPG with large-scale PvP and PvE battles! Experience the beauty of an open world with AAA graphics on mobile devices, PC and web browser. The game is about to enter the closed beta testing phase. Subscribe to our channel to stay updated on the project news! Join BS Community here and register for participation in Closed Beta-Test!

CBT Registration: https://brokensun.com/en/pre-registration/new_request/
Broken Sun in Telegram: https://t.me/brokensunEN
